channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lenovo's ThinkBook VertiFlex Concept Laptop Has a Swiveling Screen
item.description: The 14-inch ThinkBook VertiFlex Concept has a screen you can manually twist whenever the mood strikes.

item.title: ‘People Are So Proud of This’: How River and Lake Water Is Cooling Buildings
item.description: Networks of pipes and heat exchangers can transfer excess heat from buildings into nearby bodies of water—but as the world warms, the cooling potentia...

item.title: Bret Taylor’s Sierra raises $350M at a $10B valuation
item.description: Customer service AI agent startup Sierra claims to have hundreds of customers, including SoFi, Ramp, and Brex, among others.

item.title: Rivian makes its second small workforce cut of the year ahead of R2 SUV launch
item.description: The company previously laid off around 140 workers in its manufacturing division in June.

item.title: Should AI Get Legal Rights?
item.description: Model welfare is an emerging field of research that seeks to determine whether AI is conscious and, if so, how humanity should respond.

item.title: Facebook is trying to make ‘pokes’ happen again
item.description: The poke-tracking feature is largely designed to appeal to younger users who have grown up with gamification elements built into their social apps, li...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg sues Mark Zuckerberg
item.description: Mark S. Zuckerberg, an attorney, says that he's losing business because his Facebook business profile keeps getting disabled.

item.title: US Congressman’s Brother Lands No-Bid Contract to Train DHS Snipers
item.description: DHS says retired Marine sniper Dan LaLota’s firm is uniquely qualified to meet the government’s needs. LaLota tells WIRED his brother, GOP congressman...

item.title: Stripe enlists a who’s who, including Anthropic, OpenAI, and Paradigm, to build a new blockchain
item.description: Stripe is funding a new blockchain called Tempo to process stablecoins faster. And many big names are joining the effort.

item.title: Our Favorite Smart Lock for Your Front Door Is Just $164 Right Now
item.description: The Yale Approach Lock is easy to install, offers auto-unlock, and is 32% off right now.
